This is such a good game! I'd recommend CS:GO to everyone who likes FPS games. It's such a strategic and fun game. I would recommend getting prime. If you don't get prime, you're gonna face cheaters all the time. And then it's not gonna be fun playing. Be ready for trash talking people. There is a lot of them in matchmaking. There is also nice people. It's easy to make and play with friends.  All in all a good, fun and enjoyable game.
Highly competitive game with a little bit of hacks.
